cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5738, Lactation Spaces for Veteran Moms Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 188 (Tuesday, October 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. LURIA:
H.R. 5738.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 5 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the Constitution.
[Page H5932]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Lactation Spaces for Veteran Moms Act
